channel.title: Comments on: Google Thinks I’m Spyware, Yahoo Gains A New Search User

item.title: By: Jsa
item.dc:creator: Jsa
item.description:
Simply use an anonymized Proxy or free anonymized service, and do your queries .
;)
item.content:encoded:
Simply use an anonymized Proxy or free anonymized service, and do your queries .

item.title: By: Mack - Utah web designer
item.dc:creator: Mack - Utah web designer
item.description: This happened to me today. I do run multiple research type toolbars, but I discovered that is was caused by a specific query that was triggering it. Google did not offer me captcha either. Forgot what hte query was.
item.content:encoded: This happened to me today. I do run multiple research type toolbars, but I discovered that is was caused by a specific query that was triggering it. Google did not offer me captcha either. Forgot what hte query was.

item.title: By: wilbau
item.dc:creator: wilbau
item.description:
Hm, I guess to be counted as a virus is a minor problem compared to this one that as a blogger (if you become valuated as a spammer for whatever mysterious reasons) at an instant, ALL YOUR LINKS can get CUT OFF.
Guess by whom.
The G-power that can make you visible for search engines can make you also completely UNSEEN, invisible.
When this happens to you, your traffic from search engines goes down to Zero.
item.content:encoded:
Hm, I guess to be counted as a virus is a minor problem compared to this one that as a blogger (if you become valuated as a spammer for whatever mysterious reasons) at an instant,
ALL YOUR LINKS can get CUT OFF.

Guess by whom.

The G-power that can make you visible for search engines
can make you also completely UNSEEN, invisible.

When this happens to you, your traffic from search engines goes down to Zero.

item.title: By: Doug Rosbury
item.dc:creator: Doug Rosbury
item.description: Dear Google, If it happens to me again, i promise I will wipe Google off my computer. You have too much power. We users have a right to your services. You give it and you take it away. I may just call for a boycott of Google. This business of you restricting my use of your almighty search engine is foolish on your part. all I have to do is apply to the many search services and email services on the web and you can take your foolishness elsewhere. As a matter of fact, I thaink I'll do what I've threatened right now. Goodbye Google(!!!!!!) Doug Rosbury hdrosbury@gmail.com Now, no more problems from "Google". ByeBye. You can't buy all the companies.
item.content:encoded:
Dear Google, If it happens to me again, i promise I will wipe Google off my computer. You have too much power. We users have a right to your services. You give it and you take it away. I may just call for a boycott of Google. This business of you restricting my use of your almighty search
engine is foolish on your part. all I have to do is apply to the many search services and email services on the web and you can take your foolishness elsewhere. As a matter of fact, I thaink I’ll do what I’ve threatened right now. Goodbye Google(!!!!!!) Doug Rosbury hdrosbury@gmail.com
Now, no more problems from “Google”. ByeBye. You can’t buy all the companies.

item.title: By: RG
item.dc:creator: RG
item.description: Yep we're getting it too! Does it go away eventually, cos it's really annoying!
item.content:encoded: Yep we’re getting it too! Does it go away eventually, cos it’s really annoying!

item.title: By: dr-spangle
item.dc:creator: dr-spangle
item.description: This happens rather commonly at our school, I think it must be because spyware has infected the computer or a computer with a similar IP address and google's ruled that IP as Spam, but that's probably not it in reality...
item.content:encoded: This happens rather commonly at our school, I think it must be because spyware has infected the computer or a computer with a similar IP address and google’s ruled that IP as Spam, but that’s probably not it in reality…

item.title: By: DaveS
item.dc:creator: DaveS
item.description: You are not alone! Google has been picking on me as well. It is also nice that Captcha has started make the letters really hard to read.
item.content:encoded: You are not alone! Google has been picking on me as well. It is also nice that Captcha has started make the letters really hard to read.

item.title: By: RJ
item.dc:creator: RJ
item.description: I saw this recently with someone using some SEO tools on Google, everyone at our gateway's IP ended up doing this for a day or two.
item.content:encoded: I saw this recently with someone using some SEO tools on Google, everyone at our gateway’s IP ended up doing this for a day or two.
